metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20348 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: libpff_item_tree_create_node in libpff_item_tree.c in libpff before experimental-20180714 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite recursion) via a crafted file, related to libfdata_tree_get_node_value in libfdata_tree.c.

criterions.comment: libpff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180714-1').
